controller

Class ClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ClientController

  • public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
    When the game is started as a Client a new Client Controller is made and creates a new player with a requested UID. Client Controller creates a Client thread which communicates with a Server Thread.
    Author:
    Reuben Puketapu - 300310939

      Connects this client to the Server at the given port then starts the new Client thread

      Terminates the Client thread
